name: Olodum
description: '''Olodum''' is a ''bloco-afro'' from [[Salvador, Bahia|Salvador]]'s [[Salvador, Bahia#Carnival|carnival]], in [[Bahia]], [[Brazil]]. It was founded by the percussionist [[Neguinho do Samba]]. The musical group's album ''Pela Vida'' (meaning "For Life" in Portuguese) was nominated for Best Brazilian Roots/Regional Album at the 4th Annual [[Latin Grammy Awards]] in [[4th Annual Latin Grammy Awards|2003]].
